intro: This document provides a comprehensive description of the European Ground Motion Service (EGMS) products offered within the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service. It details the specifications, formats, attribute tables, and metadata associated with the EGMS Basic, Calibrated, and Ortho products, offering users a thorough understanding of these datasets. The document focuses on the technical aspects of the products, including InSAR-specific definitions, map projections, product attributes, and data formats, enabling users to effectively utilise the EGMS for ground motion analysis and monitoring.
